lejos.nxt

Interface SensorConstants

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ADSensorPort, BasicSensorPort, I2CPort, LegacySensorPort
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccelHTSensor, AccelMindSensor, AngleSensor, ColorHTSensor, ColorSensor, CompassHTSensor, CompassMindSensor, CruizcoreGyro, DIMUAccel, DIMUGyro, DPressure250, DPressure500, EOPD, GPSSensor, GyroSensor, I2CSensor, IRLink, IRSeeker, IRSeekerV2, LDCMotor, LightSensor, LMotor, LSC, LServo, MagneticSensor, MSC, MServo, NXTCam, NXTe, NXTLineLeader, NXTMMX, OpticalDistanceSensor, PFLink, PFMate, PSPNXController, RCXLightSensor, RCXLink, RCXMotorMultiplexer, RCXRotationSensor, RCXSensorMultiplexer, RCXTemperatureSensor, RealTimeClock, RemoteSensorPort, RFIDSensor, SensorMux, SensorPort, SoundSensor, SumoEyesSensor, TemperatureSensor, TetrixMotorController, TetrixServoController, TouchPanel, TouchSensor, UltrasonicSensor

    public interface SensorConstants
    Constants used to set Sensor types and modes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BLACK
      Colors used as the output value when in full mode.
      static int BLANK_INDEX
      Color sensor data BLANK/Background value index.
